text: ELISA assay was used to quantify the levels of interferonɑ/β. Supernatant in each group was collected at 6, 12 and 24 h postinfection, and analyzed by ELISA kits (R & D Systems). According to previous description [37, 38] , cells in positive control group were treated with poly I: C (Sigma) at the concentration of 10 μg/mL.
